Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for 20 runs.
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 18 runs.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 20 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match.
Jasprit Bumrah was named Player of the Series.
India won the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was held at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados.
